properties.areaDesc: Pope, AR; Perry, AR; Yell, AR
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 10 at 9:28PM CST until January 10 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
West central Perry County in central Arkansas...
Central Yell County in central Arkansas...
Southwestern Pope County in central Arkansas...

* Until 1000 PM CST.

* At 928 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Taral to near Russellville to near Petit Jean
River WMA to near Fourche Valley, moving east at 15 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage
to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Russellville...                   Danville...
Dardanelle...                     Pottsville...
Dover...                          Ola...
London...                         Lake Dardanelle State Park...
Mt Nebo State Park...             Plainview in Yell County...
Petit Jean River WMA...           Mosley...
Taral...                          Lake Dardanelle...
Corinth...                        Birta...
Ranger...                         Wing...
Kingston...                       Rover...

This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 78 and 88.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for central
Arkansas.

Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly
from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the
basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread
significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately
likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of
a building. These storms may cause serious injury and significant
property damage.
